turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a Starbucks pickup order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get aventi caffe Americano with honey and wiped cream, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Venty Place.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you have any milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: At 2%, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks located at 200 South Michigan, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you please repeat that address?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 200 South Michigan Avenue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks, so a a venti cafe americano with honey and whipped cream and 2% milk, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you're all set. your coffee will be ready for pickup at the starbucks at 200 south michigan ave soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. I appreciate the help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good bye now.
